Pre-Game Insights: Experts favored China based on their current form.
China are unbeaten in their five international games against Lebanon, keeping a clean sheet in each of their last four games against them.
Lebanon showed a remarkable defensive performance in their previous match, recording 15 tackles, the most in a single World Cup match since 2019.
Hassan Maatouk created three chances during Lebanon's match against Qatar, the second highest number of chances created by a Lebanese player in a single match in the competition since 2019.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match took place at Al Thumama Stadium.
The match was valid for the 2nd round of the Asian Cup.
